name: A Sheepless Night
description:
A Sheepless Night

Description:

An incremental base defence game inspired by the nursery rhyme “Little Bo Peep”, A Sheepless Night is a 2D, arcade, strategy shooter with elements of cute ‘em up. Follow the main character and player Lil Bo Pump as she shoots her way through mutated hoards of demonic sheep. Fight alongside some Fairytale friends to destroy waves of strange and powerful enemies.

 

Key Features:

  • -3 weapons to swap between. Shear-ikens (Long range), K9 (Explosive), Old MacDonald (Shotgun)
  • -5 enemy types with different difficult to counter combinations.
  • -6 challenging levels with 5 waves of enemies in each.
  • -Earn wool (currency) for each sheep kill confirmed.
  • -Upgrade your guns and allies to become incredibly strong.
  • -Choose to prioritise upgrading your favourite gun for different playstyles.

 

Release Date: 19 November 2019

Platform: PC

Price: FREE
